original: @#/_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i🔽sgrub thabs bzhugs/🔽ra
analyzed: @#/_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ ra
translated: The Sādhana of Mahāśūnyajñānadākinī🔽Homage to the glorious Mahāśūnyajñānadākinī.

original: gas/ @##/_/de bzhin thams cad sngar gyi cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la/
analyzed: gas/ @##/_/de bzhin thams cad sngar gyi cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la/
translated: As before, after emptiness, from the seed syllable bhrūṃ,

original: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug pa ste/_g.yas🔽kyi phyag gsum na go rims bzhin du ral gri dang /_mda' dang mchog sbyin
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug pa ste/_g.yas kyi phyag gsum na go rims bzhin du ral gri dang /_mda' dang mchog sbyin
translated: Mahāśūnyajñānadākinī is white, with one face and six arms.🔽In the three right hands, in order, she holds a sword, an arrow, and a boon-granting hand.

original: pa'o/_/g.yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang /_zhags pa dang sta re'o/_/
analyzed: pa'o/_/g.yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang /_zhags pa dang sta re'o/_/
translated: In the three left hands, she holds a bow, a lasso, and an ax.

original: sna tshhogs pa'i cha byad can/_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang dbu rgyan dang ldan pa/
analyzed: sna tshhogs pa'i cha byad can/_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang dbu rgyan dang ldan pa/
translated: She has a variety of costumes, ornaments, and a crown.

original: gzugs dang lang tshho dang ldan pa/_sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tshho dang ldan pa/_sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
translated: She has a beautiful form and youthfulness, and she has the qualities of charm and so forth.

original: pa/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/_sa bon bru yig las byung ba'o//🔽pad+ma dang zla ba'i 'od can mo/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub
analyzed: pa/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/_sa bon bru yig las byung ba'o// pad+ma dang zla ba'i 'od can mo/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub
translated: She has a crown of Vairocana and arises from the seed syllable bhrūṃ.
She has the light of a lotus and moon. The sādhana of Mahāśūnyajñānadākinī is complete.

original: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs thabs bzhugs/
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs thabs bzhugs/
translated: The method of accomplishing the Great Thousand Destroyer
